title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, regardless of the project's build status.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled in the Java perspective.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu should only be enabled when there are buildable resources in the project.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Right-click on any project in the Project Explorer. 3. Observe that the "Build" action in the popup menu is always enabled, even if there are no buildable resources in the project.
